titles.title: MORE Makerspaces Act
MORE Makerspaces Act
Move Ownership and Responsibility to Encourage Makerspaces Act of 2017
Move Ownership and Responsibility to Encourage Makerspaces Act of 2017

To amend the Federal Assets Sale and Transfer Act of 2016 to allow the Federal Government to lease or sell abandoned or unused Federal civilian real properties for use as makerspaces, and for other purposes.
MORE Makerspaces Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
